screen_desc: The screenshot shows the Pinterest mobile app login screen with an option to sign in using a Google account. A dialog box with the heading "Sign in to Pinterest" informs the user that by continuing, Google will share their name, email address, and profile picture with Pinterest. It provides a link to Pinterest's Privacy Policy and Terms of Service, and mentions that the user can manage Sign in with Google in their Google Account. A user named "Sarah Brennan" with an email address is shown, with a blue button labeled "Continue as Sarah" to facilitate the sign-in process.
